entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Picker dismiss does not work when clicking outside of the Picker #19168
  • Bundling WASDK in Packaged application throws `TypeInitializationException` #19167
  • [WinUI] Adding Toolbar item to ContentPage has unusual drop shadow on menu. #19166
  • Android Release build crashes on device but Debug build runs #19165
  • AndroidManifest no longer gets version number from project file #19164
  • External Keyboard doesn't trigger the ReturnCommand with ReturnType="Go" on Entry #19163
  • Picker SelectedIndexChanged makes selected item not visible #19162
  • I am having the same issue, any workaround? #19161
  • Top tab bar on Shell hides content (iOS only) #19159
  • Binding works in Debug Mode but fails in Release Mode #19155
  • [MacCatalyst] Cannot click a button on MAUI nightly #19154
  • Unreliable Connection to Mac from Windows #19153
  • Windows | Entry ClearButton not taking color of text #19152
  • .NET8 Android Target Framework and Minimum Android Target Framework list are empty #19150
  • [iOS] MenuItem Command not executed with FlyoutHeader set #19149

Closed

  • Make .NET MAUI a first-class part of the LTS cycle #19160
  • [Mac Catalyst] Setting MaximumTrackColor on Slider has no effect when using Mac Idiom #18111
    Backlog
  • Xamarin.PreBuilt.iOS[42280:31645665] Could not resolve assembly System.Private.DataContractSerialization.resources, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=zh-CN, PublicKeyToken=null. Details: Could not load file or assembly #17189
  • "selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects." #16333
  • Getting "Could not find any available provisioning profiles" when non Entitlements.plit file is added #19148
  • Scrolling a CollectionView with SwipeView items causes exception on Windows #7757
  • [Android] TapGestureRecognizer NumberOfTapsRequired is not working #11434
    Backlog
  • [iOS] App exceptions on physical device, but works on the simulator #12503
    Backlog
  • SwipeView crashes on Windows when in a CollectionView during scrolling #15546
    Backlog
  • Navigation to modal page #19006
  • Android - Event handler BatteryInfoChanged unsubscribe crashes when no subscribe has happened before #18376
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D6 #18726
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test E1 #18623
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Publish iOS App via cmd - Asset Validation failed #19008
  • .NET 8 on Mac #19147
  • [Android]Scrollbars Visibility property "Never" is not working properly in the ScrollView control #12028
  • [Maps] [Android] Registering for CameraMove events in a custom MapHandler disables Map.VisibleRegion.Center #13186
    Backlog
  • Enable to access dll because it is being used by another process. #11872

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct nullable annotations on IMediaPicker #19157
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞
  • Migrate to the Locker GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #19145
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨

Merged

  • [Catalyst] Allow setting of MaximumTrackColor on Slider when using Mac Idiom #18990
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [Testing] Add swipe gestures methods to UITest #19132
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Add TapCoordinates method to UITest #19151
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19144
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Blazor] Fix concurrency problem in Android builds #19140

Updated

  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [Testing] Add PressVolumeUp and PressVolumeDown methods to UITest #19131
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [WIP][iOS] Fix Flyout Header breaking clicking over items #19125
  • [Windows] Fix setting flyout width (#19068) #19070
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Update ShellSectionRenderer.cs #18945
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Fix for #11991 - CollectionView SelectedItem BackgroundColor is always Gray on iOS #17464
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    area/architecture, community ✨
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR3
  • Save device logs when UI Tests fail #19085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Added lifecycle methods to UITest #19102
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18932
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 SR1
